pull_requests.title: Update lru_cache.py to catch up python310 grammar
pull_requests.body:
Noticed this bug while using.
Thx for your great project

pull_requests.title: add `server_port` in failing log
pull_requests.body:
### Add `server_port` in log when failing to parse_header (maybe under attack)

* It will show which port is under attack.

Sample:
```
2019-02-06 00:17:06 WARNING  unsupported addrtype 223, maybe wrong password or encryption method
2019-02-06 00:17:06 ERROR    [8838] can not parse header
2019-02-06 00:17:06 ERROR    [8838] can not parse header when handling connection from 8.8.8.8:12345
```

pull_requests.title: Using AEAD cipher instead of aes-256-cfb
pull_requests.body:
From Shadowsocks.org:

> ... AEAD ciphers simultaneously provide confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity. They have excellent performance and power efficiency on modern hardware. Users should use AEAD ciphers whenever possible.

I think it's better to change the example in README.md to use ```chacha20-ietf-poly1305``` instead of ```aes-256-cfb```. It may help lots of people improve their connections' security.

pull_requests.title: Use pycodestyle instead of pep8
pull_requests.body: The upstream of pep8 has updated the name and adjusted a few rules.

repo.name: shadowsocks
repo.description: A fast tunnel proxy that helps you bypass firewalls

pull_requests.title: Allow running server w/o port in manager mode
pull_requests.body:
In case of manager API is enabled, password and ports can be added dynamically.
So it's reasonable that allowing daemon startup without listening any ports (except the manager-address).

pull_requests.title: fix no module named shadowsocks error in asyncdns
fix `TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not "str"` error whe…
pull_requests.body:
## Describe

fix `TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not "str"` error when handling manager_address argument in the Manager.__init__ method of the manager module.

## Example Configuration

```js
{
    "server":"127.0.0.1",
    "server_port":12345,
    "password":"12345678",
    "method":"aes-256-cfb",
    "fast_open":false,
    "manager_address":"127.0.0.1:6001",
}
```

## Traceback

```sh
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/bin/ssserver", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('shadowsocks', 'console_scripts', 'ssserver')()
  File "shadowsocks/server.py", line 54, in main
    manager.run(config)
  File "shadowsocks/manager.py", line 199, in run
    Manager(config).run()
  File "shadowsocks/manager.py", line 48, in __init__
    if ':' in manager_address:
TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'
```

## Fix

add the judgement of decode function for handle the str problem.

```py
if hasattr(manager_address, 'decode'):
    manager_address = manager_address.decode('utf-8')
```

pull_requests.title: Add whitelist option for autoban.py
pull_requests.body: So that IPs given in the ```whitelist```options will always be ignored and not even processed. Useful in preventing the user's client IP from being banned by the server.

pull_requests.title: Convert bad quotes to only single quote
pull_requests.body:
In some files, both single quote and double quotes are used in one line.

``` python
logging.error("server not exist at %s:%d" % (config['server'],  port)
```

I converted those bad cases to only using single quote.

pull_requests.title: dockerfile use alpine
pull_requests.body:
使用alpine作为基础,更加轻量(仅有5M),而且国内alpine镜像源比DockerHub更完善好用,这样不用从DockerHub拉取自己build可能更快捷....

你也可以在[https://hub.docker.com](https://hub.docker.com)上注册一个账号，进行自动构建,顺便跟进下文档。这样如果有人要用docker部署会方便一些

issues.title: fix no module named shadowsocks error in asyncdns
fix `TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not "str"` error whe…
issues.body:
## Describe

fix `TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not "str"` error when handling manager_address argument in the Manager.__init__ method of the manager module.

## Example Configuration

```js
{
    "server":"127.0.0.1",
    "server_port":12345,
    "password":"12345678",
    "method":"aes-256-cfb",
    "fast_open":false,
    "manager_address":"127.0.0.1:6001",
}
```

## Traceback

```sh
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/bin/ssserver", line 11, in <module>
    load_entry_point('shadowsocks', 'console_scripts', 'ssserver')()
  File "shadowsocks/server.py", line 54, in main
    manager.run(config)
  File "shadowsocks/manager.py", line 199, in run
    Manager(config).run()
  File "shadowsocks/manager.py", line 48, in __init__
    if ':' in manager_address:
TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'
```

## Fix

add the judgement of decode function for handle the str problem.

```py
if hasattr(manager_address, 'decode'):
    manager_address = manager_address.decode('utf-8')
```

issues.title: dockerfile use alpine
issues.body:
使用alpine作为基础,更加轻量(仅有5M),而且国内alpine镜像源比DockerHub更完善好用,这样不用从DockerHub拉取自己build可能更快捷....

你也可以在[https://hub.docker.com](https://hub.docker.com)上注册一个账号，进行自动构建,顺便跟进下文档。这样如果有人要用docker部署会方便一些
